name: UnofficialThreatPostBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Keep yourself and your computer safe with news from ThreatPost about the lastest security exploits. This is an unnofficial skill and not sponsored or endorsed by Kapersky Lab.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
